top.title: 'Our job is only killing' - how Sudan's brutal militia carried out a massacre
top.summary: BBC Verify tracks how the RSF killed unarmed people in a massacre that humanitarian officials believe left 2,000 dead.

top.title: Typhoon barrels towards Cambodia after killing at least 193 in Philippines and Vietnam
top.summary: One of the year's deadliest storms has headed west to Cambodia and Laos after barreling through Vietnam.

top.title: Texas sues Roblox for 'putting paedophiles and profits' over safety

top.title: Grand Theft Auto studio accused of 'union busting' after sacking workers
